an5.147:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these five gifts of a bad person.
an5.147:4.3: They give carelessly. They give thoughtlessly. They don’t give with their own hand. They give the dregs. They give without consideration for consequences.
an5.147:4.4: These are the five gifts of a bad person.
an5.147:5.1: There are these five gifts of a good person.
an5.147:5.3: They give carefully. They give thoughtfully. They give with their own hand. They don’t give the dregs. They give with consideration for consequences.
an5.147:5.4: These are the five gifts of a good person.”
